item.title: Git Submodules
item.description: What is git submodules Submodules allow you to include or embed one or more repositories as a sub-folder inside another repository. add submodule git submodule add -b master https://github.com/<USERNAME>/<USERNAME>.github.io.git public download content older version may not download submodule conten, using git submodule update --init --recursive to download content. doc https://github.blog/2016-02-01-working-with-submodules/
